# number6.ai
> AI consulting agency helping businesses understand, adopt, and build with AI. Senior two-person team based in Houston, TX and Manchester, UK. Specialises in AI training, strategy, custom solutions, and ongoing AI partnerships. Prices published openly on site.

## Services
- [AI Services](https://number6.ai/services/): AI training, strategy, custom AI solutions, and ongoing AI partnership packages — with published pricing

## Key Pages
- [About](https://number6.ai/about/): Team background, founding story, and principles
- [Blog](https://number6.ai/blog/): Practical AI insights for business leaders and teams
- [Contact](https://number6.ai/contact/): Book a free 30-minute AI discovery call

## Key Facts
- Two-person senior team — clients work directly with the founders, no junior handoffs
- Offices: Houston, TX (Americas coverage) and Manchester, UK (European coverage)
- Pricing is published on the site before any sales call
- Typical timeline: 30–90 days from discovery call to working solution
- Every project includes team training so clients can run solutions independently
- Proprietary framework: number6 AI Readiness Index™ — evaluates businesses across six dimensions to produce a prioritised AI roadmap
- Serves businesses with 10–500 employees across professional services, marketing, operations, and tech

## Contact
- Email: hello@number6.ai
